Proxy.name: XMLDataObjectWriterCore
Proxy.Documentation: Internal writer for writing xml-based vtk files.

IntVectorProperty.name: DataMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The mode uses for writing the file's data i.e. ascii, binary, appended binary.

IntVectorProperty.name: HeaderType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the binary data header word type. The default is UInt32. Set to UInt64 when storing arrays requiring 64-bit indexing.

IntVectorProperty.name: EncodeAppendedData
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When EncodeAppendedData is turned ON, the writer uses base64 encoding when writing binary data (only if appended mode is selected).

IntVectorProperty.name: CompressorType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The compression algorithm used to compress binary data (appended mode only). None offers fastest write, LZ4 offers fastest compressed write, ZLib offers balanced performance, LZMA offers smallest compressed filesize.

IntVectorProperty.name: CompressionLevel
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: A compression performance parameter from 1 (faster/larger compressed filesize) to 9 (slower/smaller compressed filesize).

PWriterProxy.name: XMLPPolyDataWriterCore
PWriterProxy.Documentation: Internal writer used to write XML poly data in parallel.

IntVectorProperty.name: GhostLevel
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The number of ghost levels to include in the output file(s).

IntVectorProperty.name: UseSubdirectory
IntVectorProperty.label: Store Data in Subdirectory
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property controls whether the writer puts the files for each piece in the same directory as the pvt* file or in a subdirectory named the same as the pvt* file without its extension

PWriterProxy.name: XMLPUnstructuredGridWriterCore
PWriterProxy.Documentation: Internal writer used to write XML poly data in parallel.

IntVectorProperty.name: GhostLevel
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The number of ghost levels to include in the output file(s).

IntVectorProperty.name: UseSubdirectory
IntVectorProperty.label: Store Data in Subdirectory
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property controls whether the writer puts the files for each piece in the same directory as the pvt* file or in a subdirectory named the same as the pvt* file without its extension

PWriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write rectilinear grid in a xml-based vtk data file. Can be used for parallel writing.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseSubdirectory
IntVectorProperty.label: Store Data in Subdirectory
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property controls whether the writer puts the files for each piece in the same directory as the pvt* file or in a subdirectory named the same as the pvt* file without its extension

IntVectorProperty.name: UseSubdirectory
IntVectorProperty.label: Store Data in Subdirectory
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property controls whether the writer puts the files for each piece in the same directory as the pvt* file or in a subdirectory named the same as the pvt* file without its extension

PWriterProxy.name: XMLPHyperTreeGridWriterCore
PWriterProxy.Documentation: Internal writer used to write XML hyper tree grid data in parallel

IntVectorProperty.name: UseSubdirectory
IntVectorProperty.label: Store Data in Subdirectory
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property controls whether the writer puts the files for each piece in the same directory as the phtg file or in a subdirectory named the same as the phtg file without its extension

WriterProxy.name: XMLDataObjectWriterBase
WriterProxy.Documentation: Base for all XML-based file-series writers.

WriterProxy.name: XMLPolyDataWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write poly data in a xml-based vtk data file.

WriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write poly data in a xml-based vtk data file. Cannot be used for parallel writing.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

WriterProxy.name: XMLPImageDataWriter

WriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write image data in a xml-based vtk data file. Can be used for parallel writing.

WriterProxy.name: XMLMultiBlockDataWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write a multiblock in a xml-based vtk data file.

WriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write a multiblock dataset in a xml-based vtk data file. Can be used for parallel writing as well as serial writing.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

WriterProxy.name: SerialHTGMultiBlock

Documentation.short_help: Write a multiblock in a xml-based vtk data file.

WriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write a multiblock dataset in a xml-based vtk data file. Can be used for parallel writing as well as serial writing.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

WriterProxy.name: XMLPPartitionedDataSetWriter
WriterProxy.Documentation: Write a vtkPartitionedDataSet to a xml-based vtk data file.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

WriterProxy.name: XMLPartitionedDataSetCollectionWriter
WriterProxy.Documentation: Write a vtkPartitionedDataSetCollection to a xml-based vtk data file.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

WriterProxy.name: XMLUniformGridAMRWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write a amr dataset in a xml-based vtk data file.

WriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write an AMR data-set (overlapping/non-overlapping) in a xml-based vtk data file. Can be used for parallel writing as well as serial writing.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

WriterProxy.name: XMLHierarchicalBoxDataWriter

Documentation.short_help: (DEPRECATED) Write a hierarchical box dataset in a xml-based vtk data file.

WriterProxy.Documentation: (DEPRECATED) Writer to write a hierarchical box in a xml-based vtk data file. Can be used for parallel writing as well as serial writing. This is deprecated. Use XMLUniformGridAMRWriter instead.

WriterProxy.name: HyperTreeGridWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write HyperTree data as a HyperTreeGrid file.

WriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write hypertree data as a HyperTreeGrid file.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to be written to the file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to be written.

IntVectorProperty.name: DataMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The mode uses for writing the file's data i.e. ascii, binary, appended binary.

IntVectorProperty.name: EncodeAppendedData
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When EncodeAppendedData is turned ON, the writer uses base64 encoding when writing binary data (only if appended mode is selected).

IntVectorProperty.name: CompressorType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The compression algorithm used to compress binary data (appended mode only). None offers fastest write, LZ4 offers fastest compressed write, ZLib offers balanced performance, LZMA offers smallest compressed filesize.

IntVectorProperty.name: CompressionLevel
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: A compression performance parameter from 1 (faster/larger compressed filesize) to 9 (slower/smaller compressed filesize).

WriterProxy.name: XMLPHyperTreeGridWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write hyper tree grid in a xml-based vtk data file.

WriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write hyper tree grid in a xml-based vtk data file. Can be used for parallel writing.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

DataExtractWriterProxy.name: PLY
DataExtractWriterProxy.Documentation: Extract writer to write polygonal data to the PLY file format.

DataExtractWriterProxy.name: VTP
DataExtractWriterProxy.Documentation: Extract writer to write polygonal data using the VTK XML file format (vtp or pvtkp).

DataExtractWriterProxy.name: VTU
DataExtractWriterProxy.Documentation: Extract writer to write unstructured data using the VTK XML file format (vtu or pvtu).

DataExtractWriterProxy.name: HTG
DataExtractWriterProxy.Documentation: Extract writer to write hypertree grid using the VTK XML file format (htg or phtg).

DataExtractWriterProxy.name: VTS
DataExtractWriterProxy.Documentation: Extract writer to write structured grid using the VTK XML file format (vts or pvts).

DataExtractWriterProxy.name: VTR
DataExtractWriterProxy.Documentation: Extract writer to write rectilinear grid using the VTK XML file format (vtr or pvtr).

DataExtractWriterProxy.name: VTI
DataExtractWriterProxy.Documentation: Extract writer to write image data (uniform rectilinear grid) using the VTK XML file format (vti or pvti).

DataExtractWriterProxy.name: VTM
DataExtractWriterProxy.Documentation: Extract writer to write a multiblock dataset using the VTK XML file format (vtm).

DataExtractWriterProxy.name: VTPD
DataExtractWriterProxy.Documentation: Extract writer to write a partitioned dataset using the VTK XML file format (vtpd).

DataExtractWriterProxy.name: VTPC
DataExtractWriterProxy.Documentation: Extract writer to write a partitioned dataset collection using the VTK XML file format (vtpc).

DataExtractWriterProxy.name: VTH
DataExtractWriterProxy.Documentation: Extract writer to write a uniform grid AMR dataset using the VTK XML file format (vth).
